## Client.pause() method

`pause` changes the synchronization mode of the given document to manual.

**Signature:**

```typescript
pause<T, P extends Indexable>(doc: Document<T, P>): Promise<Document<T, P>>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
